issue.title: [Release][R] Add r-binary-packages to packaging group
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17234](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17234). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
r-binary-packages is only in nightly-packaging and missing from the release relevant packaging group.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17234?focusedCommentId=17572460) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
